label.value: Allow each agent to select his own timeout to cancel a ticket submission
label.title: This is the label for parameter: allow_agents_choose_timeout

helpText.value: Each agent can choose his own timeout if you enable this option, otherwise the timeout is set to 10 seconds for everyone.
helpText.title: This is the help text for parameter: allow_agents_choose_timeout

cancelMessage.title: Link text for agent to cancel the submission to a ticket

cancelledMessage.title: Growl message for ticket submission failure, User requested

delaySecondsOptionLabel.title: The label text for the delay seconds dropdown option

delaySecondsOptionOff.title: The option text for disable the delay function
